snippet.title: Priscilla Presley to discuss life with Elvis on Australian Q&A tour
snippet.content:
Elvis Presley: Celebrating 80 Years Since His Birth 1:16
International sex symbol, acclaimed musical artist, serviceman and movie star? We can only be talking about one man: Elvis Presley. Today we're celebrating 80 years since his birth.
January 8th 2015 3 years ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Entertainment - syndicated/
Priscilla Presley will open to Richard Wilkins for Elvis and Me in November. Picture: AP
Cameron AdamsNews Corp Australia Network
Share
PRISCILLA Presley will discuss her famous husband during an Australian speaking tour in November. Presley's Elvis and Me show is billed as an "intimate interview format" where she will answer questions posed by host Richard Wilkins. August 16 this year marks the 40th anniversary of Presley's death, aged just 42. Elvis and Priscilla were married for six years and had daughter Lisa Marie Presley before divorcing in 1973.
Elvis Presley married Priscilla Beaulieu on May 1, 1967 in Las Vegas. Picture: SuppliedSource:News Corp Australia The show promises "open conversation offering audiences an extremely rare opportunity to gain insight into a world only a few have entered" and that Presley will "answer questions and share stories that will spark curiosity and intriguing dialogue." Presley manages the incredibly lucrative Elvis estate, and turned their home Graceland into a tourist attraction. Presley's estate continues to make millions through posthumous tours (where live bands play along to his voice via video screens) and new albums finding different ways to reinvent his back catalogue.
Priscilla Presley pictured last week. Picture: Getty ImagesSource:Getty Images
Priscilla Presley launches an Elvis stamp in 2015. Picture: APSource:AAP Elvis and Me takes place at The Star Gold Coast on November 4, Crown Theatre Perth on November 6, Crown Palladium Melbourne on November 9 and The Star Event Centre in Sydney on November 12. Tickets go on sale this Friday and are priced at between $110 and $230, with some venues having a VIP dinner option for $400.
